faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Flipika pricing.
faq.q1: How does the free trial work?
faq.a1: You get 14 days of full access after entering your payment details. Connect your Google Ads accounts and generate unlimited reports. You won't be charged during the trial period.
faq.q2: What counts as a "Google Ads account"?
faq.a2: Each Google Ads account (MCC sub-account or standalone) that you connect to Flipika counts as one seat. You only pay for accounts you actively connect.
faq.a3: Yes, absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your billing settings. You'll keep access until the end of your current billing period.
faq.q4: What's included in the Lifetime plan?
faq.a4: The Lifetime plan gives you permanent access to all current and future features, unlimited accounts, and priority support. One payment, no recurring fees, ever.
faq.q5: Will the Lifetime plan price increase?
faq.a5: Yes. The current price is a special early adopter offer. As we add more features, the price will increase. Lock in the current price while it lasts.
faq.q6: How does billing work if I add or remove accounts?
faq.a6: Your monthly bill adjusts automatically. Add accounts and pay more, remove accounts and pay less. It's prorated so you're always charged fairly.
faq.a7: Absolutely. All payments are processed by Stripe, a PCI-DSS Level 1 certified payment provider. We never store your credit card information.
faq.a8: We offer a full refund within the first 30 days of any paid subscription if you're not satisfied. For the Lifetime plan, the same 30-day guarantee applies.
